sentences.sContent: We have a helium nucleus and one electron.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have a helium nucleus and one electron.
sentences.sCn: 我们有一个氦核和一个电子。

sentences.sContent: If helium loses on electron, what do we have?
sentences.sContent_eng: If helium loses on electron, what do we have?
sentences.sCn: 如果氦原子失去了一个电子，我们得到了什么？

trans.tranOther: a gas that is lighter than air and is used to make  balloons  float. It is a chemical  element  ：symbol He
